name: Let there be knight
description:
Play some games on your desktop, nothing could go wrong.

Work your way through reflection and snake based puzzles, put some statues in the right place, manoeuvre  through mazes without turning back, use reflections to help you forward and open gates to eat some fruits.

Features:

  • 24 levels 
  • Several strange puzzle mechanics
  • 2 games
  • No story
  • Sound effects
  • Window based gameplay

Made for Mini Jam 121: Reflection in 3 days.
